scripts.package-win: electron-packager . coinbase-pro-desktop --overwrite --asar=true --platform=win32 --arch=ia32 --icon=icons/win/bitcoin.ico --prune=true --out=release-builds --version-string.CompanyName="github.com/milan102" --version-string.FileDescription="Desktop application for Coinbase Pro" --version-string.ProductName="Coinbase Pro Desktop"
scripts.create-installer-mac: electron-installer-dmg ./release-builds/Coinbase\ Pro\ Desktop-darwin-x64/Coinbase\ Pro\ Desktop.app coinbase-pro-desktop --out=release-builds --overwrite --icon=icons/mac/bitcoin.icns
